T02D2632:166a-18: aom badzra satva su sam gra ha h'um /
T02D2632:166a-19: zhes pa'i sngags kyis ras dkar po gtsang ma'i nang du bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2632:166a-20: de nas de nyid kyi tshe thal bar gyur pa dang /
T02D2632:166a-21: sku gdung gi las brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2632:166a-22: de la dang por thal ba dang rus pa phye mar btags pa la /
T02D2632:166a-23: ga pur la sogs pa'i dri chu la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab ste ba'i 'o ma dang /
T02D2632:166a-27: lci ba la sogs pa rtsa ba'i sngags 'bum du bzlas pas brdzis te /
T02D2632:166a-28: de dang sa kha dog dkar po la ga bur la sogs pa'i dris bsgos pa dang /
T02D2632:166a-29: 'jim pa legs par bsres la dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs su bya ba'am /
T02D2632:166a-30: rang gi lha'i gzugs su bya ba'am /
T02D2632:166a-31: yang na mchod rten gyi gzugs su byas te /
T02D2632:166a-32: de nas yongs su dag pa'i cho ga bya ba ni /
T02D2632:166a-33: rnal 'byor pas srid pa bar mdo'i sems can la ni /
T02D2632:166a-34: 'di ltar bdun pa gnyis pa la ni dmyal ba'i
T02D2632:166a-35: dkyil 'khor gling bcu drug pa la ro dong zab
T02D2632:166a-36: bu bcas pa'i dbus su gtsug tor dgu pa'i dkyil
T02D2632:166a-37: 'khor bzhengs la / de la cho ga ji lta
T02D2632:166a-38: ba bzhin du yongs su mchod la rdzing bu'i nang
T02D2632:166b-1: rtsa ba'i sngags bum pa dkar po la bsngags pas
T02D2632:166b-2: srid pa bar ma do'i sems thig le'i gzugs su
T02D2632:166b-4: bdun pa gsum pa la yi dags kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2632:166b-5: gling bzhi pa'i dbus su gong bu smos pa'i dkyil
T02D2632:166b-6: 'khor gyi bum pa la bzlas pa'i thig le'i gzugs
T02D2632:166b-8: bzhi pa la dud 'gro'i dkyil 'khor gling bzhi pa'i
T02D2632:166b-9: dbus su dkyil 'khor bris pas thig le'i gzugs dud
T02D2632:166b-10: 'gro'i gnas nas gdon par bya ba dang /
T02D2632:166b-11: lnga pa la lha ma yin gyi dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dbus su dkyil 'khor la brten te /
T02D2632:166b-12: thig le'i gzugs lha ma yin gyi gnas nas gdon par bya ba dang /
T02D2632:166b-13: drug pa la mi'i dkyil 'khor gling bzhi pa'i dbus
T02D2632:166b-14: su dkyil 'khor bris la thig le'i gzugs dbul po'i
T02D2632:166b-15: gnas nas gdon par bya ba dang /
T02D2632:166b-16: bdun pa la lha'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2632:166b-17: thig le'i gzugs lha tshe ring po'i gnas nas gdon
T02D2632:166b-18: cing rnam par grol ba la sogs pa'i mtshan mar
T02D2632:166b-19: gyur na / de nyid kyi mtshan mo srid pa
T02D2632:166b-20: bar ma do'i sems can gyi kun gzhi rnam par
T02D2632:166b-21: shes pa 'khor ba las ldog pa'i rgyus 'jug pa
T02D2632:166b-22: gyur na / yin te / de'i tshe de'i rigs
T02D2632:166b-23: kyi gtso bo rgyal po la sogs pa'i mi'i gzugs
T02D2632:166b-24: gyur na / yin te / byas te / gzugs
T02D2632:166b-25: de'i snying gar bris pa'i ming dang tsandan dkar po
T02D2632:166b-26: dang dmar po bsres pa'i sbyor bas pha dang ma
T02D2632:166b-28: de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs la dmigs par byas pa /
T02D2632:166b-29: de'i skad cig ma la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor
T02D2632:166b-30: ba la dmigs pas yongs su dag pa'i ting nge
T02D2632:166b-31: 'dzin la zhugs nas thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor
T02D2632:166b-32: ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rang gi padmar bcug nas dkyil
T02D2632:166b-33: 'khor du dbang bcu rdzogs par bskur la /
T02D2632:166b-34: phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su btags te /
T02D2632:166b-35: me tog gi phreng ba thogs nas /
T02D2632:166b-36: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

T02D2632:166b-39: cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po
T02D2632:167a-0: aom ya th'a sa ma yo ga th'a @167a * //
T02D2632:167a-2: aom k'a ya bi ya st'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2632:167a-3: a'a: b'aka bi ya st'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2632:167a-4: h'um tsitta bi ya st'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2632:167a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu gnas par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2632:167a-7: de nas gzugs de nyid rgyal po la sogs pa'i cha lugs su byas pas /

T02D2632:167a-14: zhag re bzhin du mchod rten gyi gzugs la bde

T02D2632:167a-16: lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ba nyid
T02D2632:167a-17: do // de nas ngan 'gro las rnam par grol bar gyur pa ni mchod rten 'bar ba dang /

T02D2632:167a-20: bdug pa'i tshe 'od snang ba dang /

T02D2632:167a-22: sku gdung la sogs pa 'bar ba dang /
T02D2632:167a-25: rgyan la sogs pa 'od 'bar ba dang /
T02D2632:167a-26: dung dang pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra grags pa na /
T02D2632:167a-27: sdig can gang zag de ngan 'gro las grol bar shes par bya'o //

T02D2632:167a-29: rtags dang mtshan ma de dag mi 'byung ba ste /
T02D2632:167a-30: de la rnal 'byor mchog gi snying rje chen po
T02D2632:167a-31: dang ldan pas yid skyo ba med pas brtse ba
T02D2632:167a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su
T02D2632:167a-34: sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su
T02D2632:167a-35: gsol la / mchod pa rgya chen po byas la /
T02D2632:167a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'am /
T02D2632:167a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'bum phrag stong ngam /
T02D2632:167a-38: yang na ji srid mtshan ma byung gi bar du /
T02D2632:167a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2632:167a-40: de'i rjes la bzlas pa'i grangs su thim pa dang /
T02D2632:167a-41: mtshan ma byung ba'i mtshan mo thog thag tu mchod pa dang /
T02D2632:167b-0: gtor ma'i tshogs chen po byas @167b te ;

T02D2632:167b-5: tshe 'das pa de nyid lha'i gzugs su gyur te /
T02D2632:167b-6: de la rnal 'byor pas bdag gi don phun sum

T02D2632:167b-8: las thams cad bcol ba dang /

T02D2632:167b-19: zhes brjod la gtad bar bya ste /

T02D2632:167b-33: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /

T02D2632:167b-35: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis /
